overview: Soumya left home when he was young. He was a closeted gay and feared of his parents' non-acceptance if he came out to them. But years later, he gets a call from his younger brother who asks him to meet urgently in a valley of flowers. Soumya brings along his boyfriend Aneek to face them all together. But will the journey lead to acceptance?
tagline: dive deep into a story of love and reminscence.
title: Valley of Memories
